betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Gregtech has it's Machines divided in §3Tiers§f. Each Recipe in an Machine has an minimum §2§3Tier §fneeded to be able to be processed. 

There are 10 Tiers in Gregtech by standard:
§e0 - Ultra Low Voltage (ULV)
1 - Low Voltage (LV)
2 - Medium Voltage (MV)
3 - High Voltage (HV)
4 - Extreme Voltage (EV)
5 - Insane Voltage (IV)
6 - Ludicrious Voltage (LuV)
7 - Zero Point Module (ZPM)
8 - Ultimate Voltage (UV)
9 - Ultra High Voltage (UHV)

§eULV§f doesn't have any Machines.

§2§2§fYou may notice that §2§eSteam §fis not listed here, that has the reason that it is not directly an §3Tier§f on it's own and can perform all recipes that are §3§eLV§f.

§fUsing an higher §2§3§3Tier§f to process an Recipe with an lower §3Tier§f needed, the time of the Recipe gets halfed each time by how much the current §3Tier §fis greater than the §3Tier§f needed, so an §2§3§§§eLow Voltage§f Recipe in an §f§3§d§e§eHigh Voltage§f Machine have the time cut in half two times.
